text: 'iidh qal lahum 'akhuhum salh: 'alaa takhshawn eiqab allh, ftufridwnh balebad? 'iiniy mrsal min allah 'ilykm, hafiz ealaa hadhih alrisalat kama tlqytha ean allh, fahdharuu eqabh teala, wamtthlu ma daeawtukum 'ilyh. wama 'atlub minkum ealaa nushi w'irshady lakum 'aya jza', ma jzayy 'iilaa ealaa rabi alealmyn
